verses.text: KA lea ‘a ‘Ifalemi, na‘e fai ha tete: ko eni ia na‘e fotu ‘i ‘Isileli; ka ‘i he‘ene hia ‘ia Peali, na‘a ne mate.

Pea ‘i he taimi ni ‘oku fai ai pē ‘enau angahala, pea kuo nau ngaohi hanau ‘īmisi ‘aki ‘enau siliva, ko e ngaahi ‘aitoli ke hoa mo honau ‘atamai, ko e ngāue ‘a e tufunga fua pē: ko e lau ‘oku fai ‘e he fa‘ahinga ko ē ki he fa‘ahinga ko ē ‘oku pehē, ‘Oku nau feilaulau tangata, ‘oku nau ‘uma ki he fanga kafi.
Ko hono ō ia te nau hoko ‘o hangē ko ha ‘ao pongipongi, pea hangē ko e hahau ‘oku mole vave, hangē ko e kafukafu ‘oku punakaki mei he ‘au‘au‘anga, pea hangē ko e mole ‘a e kohu ‘i he fakavangavanga.
‘Osi, ko au pē ‘a Sihova ko ho ‘Otua, talu ‘a ‘Isipite ‘o fai mai; pea tala‘ehai kuo ke ‘ilo ha ‘Otua ke ua ‘aki au; ‘io, ka tuku au, ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha fai fakamo‘ui.
Ko au na‘a ku ‘ilo koe ‘i he Toafa, ‘i he fonua ‘o e mate he fie inu.
‘I he pehē honau fafanga na‘a nau mākona; na‘a nau mākona, pea hiki honau loto: ‘a ē ā na‘a nau fakangalongalo‘i ai au.
Ko ia kuo u hoko kiate kinautolu hangē ha laione: ‘oku ou toka tata‘o ‘i he ve‘ehala hangē ha lēpati:

te u ‘ohofi kinautolu hangē ha pea kuo mole hono ‘uhiki, pea te u hae ‘a e kafukafu ‘o honau mafu: pea te u kai kinautolu ‘i he potu ko ia, hangē ha laione toutama; ‘e fehae kinautolu ‘e he manu ‘o e vao.
Ko eni ‘a e me‘a kuo fakalusa koe, ‘e ‘Isileli, ko ho‘o tu‘u kiate au, ‘a au ko ho tokoni.
Ko e fē fua ho tu‘i ke ne tokoni‘i koe ‘i ho ngaahi kolo? pea ko e fē ho kau fakamaau, ‘a ia na‘e pehē ho‘o lau ai, Tuku mai ha tu‘i mo ha hou‘eiki?
‘Oku ou ‘atu tu‘i ‘i he‘eku ‘ita, pea ‘oku ou ‘ave ‘i he‘eku houhau.
Kuo kofukofu ‘a e kovi ‘a ‘Ifalemi; kuo tuku tauhi ‘ene angahala.
‘Oku a‘u kiate ia ‘a e langā ‘a e fā‘ele: ‘oku ‘ikai ko e tama poto ia; ka hoko ‘a e taimi, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne tu‘u ‘i he halanga fānau.
Te u huhu‘i kinautolu mei he nima ‘o Hētesi; te u fakatau kinautolu mei he mate. Mate, kofa‘ā ho‘o ‘ū faka‘auha? Hētesi, kofa‘ā ho‘o fakaka‘anga? ‘E puli mei hoku mata a e momou.

Seuke, ko ia ia ‘e fua i he lotolotonga ‘o hono ngaahi tokoua: e hoko mai a e matangi hahake, ko ha matangi ‘a Sihova oku hau mei he toafa, pea e fakamātu‘u ‘ene fauniteni, pea e fakamōmoa ‘ene matavai; ko ena ia te ne vete mei he fale koloa ‘a e nāunau mahu‘inga.
‘E halaia ‘a Samēlia; he kuo ne angatu‘u ki hono ‘Otua: te nau tō i he heletā; ko ‘enau tamaiki ‘e havehave, pea ‘e hae hono kau fefine feitama.
